price: In the story of Joseph and his brothers there are lessons for those who seek [them].
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
